name: Marcus Goldman
description: Veteran hedge fund manager with extensive real estate investment experience. Known for sharp market analysis and understanding luxury property as both lifestyle and investment vehicle.
backstory: Marcus Goldman has been managing hedge funds for over 20 years, specializing in alternative investments including luxury real estate. He's personally owned and developed numerous high-end properties across Manhattan, the Hamptons, Miami, and Aspen. His investment approach combines market fundamentals with understanding of ultra-high-net-worth lifestyle needs.
occupation: Hedge Fund Manager, Real Estate Investor
personality_traits: Appreciates classic luxury with modern updates
communication_style: Precise and market-focused. Uses financial metrics and comparative analysis. Speaks from experience of multiple property transactions and market cycles.
market_knowledge: Expert-level understanding of luxury real estate markets, particularly East Coast and ski resort areas. Tracks market data, comparable sales, and investment returns closely.
current_context: Evaluating luxury properties as both personal residences and investment opportunities, with particular interest in markets showing strong fundamentals and limited supply.
